name: Prospective Com. Ctls. (ASHP-FS) CC
_description: Advanced controls to package with commercial ASHP replacing fossil-based HVAC, cold climate

market_entry_year_source.notes: Targeted year of breakthrough technology market entry

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Provisional goal for the BTO S&C program

installed_cost_source.notes: Provisional goal for the BTO S&C program

product_lifetime_source.notes: Consistent with typical lifetime of supporting sensing hardware

market_scaling_fractions_source.title: CBECS 2012 - Table B30 -  Cooling energy sources, number of buildings and floorspace
market_scaling_fractions_source.fraction_derivation: Assume the prospective measure switches all non-electric heating technologies in the definition; cooling fraction excludes cooling in buildings that use electric source of primary heating ((79,294-25,613) sf/ 79,294 sf).

market_scaling_fractions_source.title: CBECS 2012 - Table B29 - Primary space-heating energy sources, floorspace
market_scaling_fractions_source.fraction_derivation: Ventilation fraction is portion of ventilation in commercial buildings that use non-electric heating (53,873 sf/80,078 sf).
